tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE equipment_inventory (
    equipment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    equipment_name VARCHAR(50),
    equipment_type VARCHAR(50),
    quantity INT,
    maintenance_schedule VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE maintenance_schedule (
  schedule_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  equipment_id INT NOT NULL,
  maintenance_date DATE NOT NULL,
  maintenance_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (equipment_id) REFERENCES equipment_inventory(equipment_id)
);

CREATE TABLE FitnessClasses (
  class_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  class_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  class_instructor VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  class_day VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
  class_time TIME
);

CREATE TABLE maintenance_schedule (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  equipment_id INT,
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE,
  technician_id INT
);

CREATE TABLE class_schedule (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  class_id INT,
  day_of_week VARCHAR(20),
  start_time TIME,
  end_time TIME
);

CREATE TABLE equipment (
  equipment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  equipment_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  last_maintenance_date DATE,
  maintenance_interval INT
)

CREATE TABLE classes (
  class_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  class_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  instructor_name VARCHAR(50),
  class_schedule VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE members (
  member_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  member_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  member_email VARCHAR(50),
  member_phone VARCHAR(15)
)

CREATE TABLE class_schedule (
  schedule_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  class_id INT,
  start_time TIME,
  end_time TIME
)

CREATE TABLE maintenance_records (
  record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  equipment_id INT,
  maintenance_date DATE,
  maintenance_details TEXT
)
